responses:
We have sales stores in different parts of the world. You can buy from any of these stores:-
Pininfarina Headquarters: Turin, Italy
Pininfarina Design Centers: Turin, Italy; Mumbai, India; and other global locations (specific cities often vary based on projects and partnerships)
Authorized Dealerships for Pininfarina Battista: Locations can include major cities like Milan, London, New York, and others, depending on the dealership network
Automotive Events and Exhibitions: Locations vary based on the event (e.g., Geneva, Switzerland; Pebble Beach, USA)
Exclusive Experience Centers: Locations vary and are typically arranged for high-profile clients
